Release Notes¶

Current Releases¶

Note

Add Release Notes

0.1.0 (master)¶

This is the first official release of the MHKiT Python package. The package includes methods for resource assessment and to compute device performance using data collected in wave and river environments.

Note

Add future features e.g. quality control
